author: leosimons
msg: * pygump/python/gump/plugins/logreporter.py: in addition to outputting log messages, make the log reporter output stack traces for all exceptions that were swallowed during the run.

author: leosimons
msg: Create a new error handler which swallows exceptions.

* pygump/python/gump/plugins/__init__.py: new OptimisticLoggingErrorHandler that does not re-raise exceptions but rather stores them as part of the relevant model element. This enables processing to continue in the case of malfunctioning plugins, but is a rather 'crude' setup mostly useful for debugging.

author: noel
msg: remove remnants of CLI.  contents already moved to httpd project

author: tripod
msg: [JCR-107] Typos in jcr-server io package javadocs
